content: learn how to create brodie the stegosaurus amigurumi with this free dinosaur crochet pattern this is an easy crochet pattern including full video tutorial perfect for beginners you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini stegosaurus from sport weight cotton yarn and big stegosaurus from chenille super bulky plush yarn the pattern has a full video included on how to make this cute dinosaur amigurumi link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-dinosaur-crochet-pattern/ link to youtube video tutorial https //youtu be/clven7zifso
